heading: Invigorating Strike Rogue Build Guide
content: Welcome to the ! This is a basic attack build designed for quick and fast gameplay that does well in both single target applications and density, thanks to many different multiplicative offerings to buff really starts getting good when you find the . which is a hefty damage buff and a way to cleverly use the specialization to take this build even further. We also use for damage reduction and to cast our ultimate skill often, giving us full uptime on a massive legendary node multiplier, shares a lot of similarities to and thus have similar strengths. The playstyle's are different, as plays like a true melee build that has no issues getting dirty up close. If you like the simplicity and speed of , but want to play an assassin like playstyle, then this build is for you! The Season 9 theme is the . This season allows you to craft unique using three different components: a , and three through the Seasonal Questline, and can be found while exploring . You choose a Skill as the trigger for your . Once in Torment I or higher, can be crafted, which replace the Gems in your Jewelry, adding additional power to your build. and attach it to to make our procs for a bit more efficient with the arcana powers. as our Infusion to have a higher uptime on Chill and Freeze for Rogue is a straight forward build. It's high in mobility and damage modifiers. Below explains how to best get the most out of each skill on your bar. - Spend resource to reduce your ultimate cooldown and gain 15% damage reduction. this requires for it to spend energy to make use of this specialization. Use the slider to see the progression steps. At around Paragon 200, leveling slows down significantly and all important nodes and Glyph sockets should be unlocked. Afterwards, you can min/max your build with minor tweaks and by picking up additional smaller nodes. Some Glyph position swaps, board changes and other pathing adjustments may occur as you unlock your full potential. The setup displayed by default is the final version of the build before spending additional points that do not significantly impact your character's power. You can have up to two Runewords in your setup, each consisting of one Rune. Socket them in Two-Handed Weapons if your build calls for them, otherwise place them into your Armor pieces to replace normal gems. Rapid Fire Rogue focuses on the following combos: If you haven't unlocked the final setup or found the top runes, you can also benefit from these options: are unlocked during the Vessel of Hatred campaign and assist you in battle. There are 4 separate Mercenaries to choose from, each with their own skill trees and abilities. You can have one (permanent) mercenary during solo play and a who assists you from time to time in certain situations. We take Bastion for the shield, the unstoppable and decent damage buffs. She provides a knockdown to proc the second portion of To enable the Invigorating Strike Rogue to perform optimally, hunt for these stats on your gear with good rolls and aim to them accordingly. The indicates which affix is most impactful to , and it does not indicate how many you need on that particular affix. Keep in mind that certain stats, such as Armor, Resistances, Extra Size Tempers, Attack Speed, and more, have caps that may affect your priorities according to the items and Paragon points available at that moment. Before you dive into the Endgame with the Death Trap Rogue, take a look at this overview of the items used in the build. See below for further details about the different progression steps and variants. Some of your Skill Tree choices depend on what items are available to you. Keep in mind that while we can guarantee that everyone has access to the same Aspects, the exact progression is different for everyone. This section is designed to guide your Invigorating Strike Rogue from a fresh level 60 into the very late endgame using the three variants . At the final step, you should be fully decked out with a great all-rounder build. From there, follow the other min/max variants if you want to optimize around certain activities such as If you are fresh in Torment 1 coming from a leveling guide, this is where you begin. Since only some Aspects can be guaranteed from Dungeon unlocks for the , focus on acquiring the additional aspects via gambling with Make sure to use to scale our energy to maximize the new rework aspect. The goal here is to progress through the Torment difficulties as you unlock Ancestrals, Paragon points, all and the most important to pilot this build. Some are used temporarily to fill slots that may be replaced with more items later on. Make sure to use to scale our energy to maximize the new rework aspect. This is the final version of the build's progression, including all regular , leaving you with a great all-rounder build for all content in the game. Additional variants use this as a baseline to optimize around certain activities. Make sure to use to scale our energy to maximize the new rework aspect. This Speedfarming variant optimizes the build for easy activities like Tiers after you have finished the variant and reached a plateau in your progression. For Speedfarming, we opt for for more movement. Everything else stays exactly the same. This setup optimizes the build to push the highest possible Tiers in after you have finished the variant and reached a plateau in your progression. Make sure you have innervation tempers in all of your jewelry slots.  Resourceful Elixir also helps if you're struggling. Yes.  Alternative stats that are decent are as follows: Even without on your skill bar, you can gain shrouds through the rune. It is used in this build to profit from the enormous damage reduction especially when you get hit infrequently. You gain stacks by hitting enemies with greatly benefitting from Lucky Hit Chance. Learn about the mechanical details that make the build tick. Read up more on Attack Speed in our Rogue is a superb allrounder with a toolkit that prepares you for all situations. It's a fun and mobile farming build that with a few tweaks can transform into a DPS powerhouse to take on the biggest challenges the game has to offer. I hope you enjoy a great build.
